description:
Today is the day of Haruka`s idol HAYATO`s new song announcement event.
Ignoring the concern of her friends, Haruka heads into town alone in high spirits, but she ends up lost just as her friends predicted. Just as she reaches her wit`s end, she happens upon Natsuki and greets him, but Natsuki isn`t his usual kind self...
Source: crunchyroll
